speaker: President. −
english: President. − I have just received eleven requests for the floor, which therefore cannot be granted. I would remind Members who do not speak during the debate that they may submit a written statement of no more than 200 words, which will be annexed to the verbatim report of the debate, or give an explanation of vote at the end of the speeches.
original: President. − I have just received eleven requests for the floor, which therefore cannot be granted. I would remind Members who do not speak during the debate that they may submit a written statement of no more than 200 words, which will be annexed to the verbatim report of the debate, or give an explanation of vote at the end of the speeches.
